articles.title: Over 800 killed, 2,500 injured as strong earthquake and multiple aftershocks strike Afghanistan
articles.description: A massive rescue operation was underway in Afghanistan on Monday, September 1, 2025, after a strong earthquake and multiple aftershocks flattened homes in a remote, mountainous region, killing more than 800 people, the Taliban authorities said. [1]

articles.title: Top News Headlines of September 1, 2025 | Calcutta HC puts interim stay on sale of a portion of Alipore Zoo
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi redefined the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation (SCO) as Security, Connectivity and Opportunity, and raised the terrorist attack in Pahalgam. The Calcutta High Court also put an interim stay on the sale of a portion of Alipore Zoo. [2]

articles.title: Global News Morning September 2, 2025
articles.description: The death toll from the Afghanistan earthquake surpasses 1,400. The program also covers other top news, including Israel committing genocide in Gaza according to world scholars, and labor strikes surging in Canada. [8]
